body.description: Our Women’s 40+ One Daily Multivitamin contains 21 vitamins and minerals plus a botanical blend. 66% of the ingredients are cultured from whole food. If you like New Chapter 40+ Every Woman's One Daily Multi, we invite you to try Amazon Elements Women's 40+ One Daily Multivitamin.Suggested use: Take one tablet daily with food as a dietary supplement.Every batch of Amazon Elements vitamins and supplements is rigorously tested to ensure quality and safety. Scan the label using your Amazon app to view our most recent test results for this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2018
reviews.reviewText: It's really hard to write a review or even read a review since everyone is going to have a different reaction.. But for me, these are amazing. I'm 21 years old and I know I don't get all the right nutrients in a day. These help out a lot. The pill is rather large and has a weird taste, but I take mine with a protein shake so it doesn't bother me at all. I definitely recommend these to any woman who needs a little help getting all their nutrients in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These vitamins are very large but it is so easy to swallow there are some people writing reviews saying they can’t swallow it but I can take a handful pills and swallow them with a sip of water and did not notice a struggle with this pill. I did not notice any aftertaste like some vitamins can give you. Because of the results I am receiving from this multivitamin that I have never felt with any other vitamin and at age 65 trust me I’ve taken a lot of vitamins. And this is 100% a great product that will give you what you need to get through your day and make you feel better. There’s really not much I can say to convince anybody to really buy this product but please don’t be discouraged by the other reviews about the pill being too large to swallow. When I open the bottle I was like wow this is a horse pill I don’t know well here goes nothing it went right down and I’ve not had a problem since. I am one that will read reviews and raise my reason to buy or not to buy from them but I’m so glad I went for it because I was in need of a good vitamin that would actually work and in some of the comments I read they were definitely talking about how pleased they were with the results. And now I can honestly agree with them and share in this review telling anyone that takes these vitamins and can get them down without an issue will be very glad they purchased these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent botanical blend along with all the essentials
reviews.reviewText: I travel - a lot and it is easier to pack a multivitamin vs packing my individual supplements.Pros: Gentle on my stomach. Good blend of vitamins & botanical ingredients. Love that it has ginger, turmeric, hawthorn & moreCons: The size of the vitamins usually don’t bother me but this one is quite large and has an unpleasant smell. I also do not enjoy that my age is plastered on the bottle (now I am just being petty I know)Will I buy again? Most likely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These vitamins seem to work very well for me - i tried Pure - more expensive and tons more B12 which is unnecessary and made me sick after a few days.These are reasonably priced and do the job !One sole criticism- they are a bit large to swallow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One a day high quality vitamins
reviews.reviewText: Like that they are healthier grade and cost effective. The aftertaste is a little strong. You have to chase it down with liquid afterwards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So hard to swallow. So big!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These have really good ingredients and just what I need !
reviews.reviewText: These have great ingredients and have all the things I need. Obviously the taste isn't the best BUT they still give me energy and I feel like they help with the things i'm needing in a vitamin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality product at a fair price
reviews.reviewText: Quality vitamins, didn’t have as bad of an aftertaste as some others I’ve tried. Would like to buy in larger quantities / family size.
